item.title: CNN Ohio Poll: Romney Up 13 Among Election-Day Voters
item.description: c'mon OHIO- VOTE!-->CNN Ohio Poll Shows Romney Up 13 Among Election Day Voters http://t.co/qhhzib15
item.content:encoded: c'mon OHIO- VOTE!-->CNN Ohio Poll Shows Romney Up 13 Among Election Day Voters http://t.co/qhhzib15 If you want to understand why voters no longer trust pollsters, look no further than the latest CNN poll of Ohio voters, showing President Barack Obama with a 50%-47% lead over Gov. Mitt Romney--a result that is within the poll’s 3.5% margin of error, but which suggests a slight Obama lead. The internal numbers reveal that Romney is leading among independents by 2%, and winning Election Day voters by a staggering 13%. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: breitbart.com

item.title: The 100th Day of the Romney Administration
item.description: BREAKING NEWS: http://t.co/CHrgl7Mp
item.content:encoded: BREAKING NEWS: http://t.co/CHrgl7Mp Share this: http://OFA.BO/KE8yxX Tweet this: http://OFA.BO/Mm3Fq1 Vote: http://OFA.BO/yBhQXY Take a look at the first 100 days of the Romney administration. Elections have consequences, and this is the "real change" that Romney is promising. It's the kind of change that Americans simply can't afford. In four days, Americans will decide if they want to continue moving forward with President Obama, or if Romney gets to deliver the change he has promised, taking us back to the same failed policies of the past. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: youtube.com

item.title: 85% of Israel's American Jewish Voters Pick Romney
item.description: 85% of Israel's American Jewish Voters Pick Romney: American Jews who are living in Israel have cast their votes... http://t.co/dfxC4FHK
item.content:encoded: 85% of Israel's American Jewish Voters Pick Romney: American Jews who are living in Israel have cast their votes... http://t.co/dfxC4FHK The total number of American Jews voting in Israel is roughly 80,000. That’s about 25% of all ballots from all Americans living abroad. It represents 50% of all eligible U.S. voters in Israel, indicating that the American Jews there are greatly motivated to vote this year. That figure is double the number of ballots ever cast before. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: breitbart.com
